page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content:
Yate has a wide variety of housing to suit the needs of most people. The majority of properties are privately owned but some are rented. The types of homes available are terraced houses,semi-detached houses, detached houses,bungalows and flats. Most of the houses have been built during the last twenty years. In June 1985 these were the advertised prices: Flats {Â£18,000 + Terraced {Â£22,000 + Semi-det {Â£25,000 -Â£35,000 Detached {Â£43,000 -Â£70,000 + Bungalows{Â£30,000 +
All of the properties are built on level ground making them suitable for young ,elderly or disabled people.
